channel.title: America becoming a 3rd world country?
channel.description:
Well, a lot with the economy being down. I've been thinking a lot of everything. Do you think that America is going to become a 3rd world country? I know it hasn't yet, but in future terms, will it? I've even contemplated moving to Canada (so help me God).
Discuss I guess?

item.title: America becoming a 3rd world country?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Frell:

It was the government of new Orleans fault, they didn’t want help from a republican (Bush) so they didn’t allow a republican association to help. Then all the ignorant people blamed Bush when it was their governors fault. Not to mention New Orleans didn’t practice their evacuations etc. Bush also knew it was a flood zone, which is why he sent money to them to reinforce the levies. THE GOVERNOR FELT IT WASN’T VERY IMPORTANT SO HE SPENT IT ON OTHER SHT.

You can say what you want, in the end the President is responsible for what his government does. I don’t know how strict they are about that in the US, but in the Netherlands a government can fall because one minister does a bad job. I think the same can happen in the US; if the President decides to give money to a state for a specific cause, the money should be used for that. If it doesn’t, the governor should be fired. If that doesn’t happen, the President is to blame.

Read full topic

item.title: America becoming a 3rd world country?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:26, topic:301082”][quote author=Greg the Xeno link=topic=397382.msg2962906#msg2962906 date=1253367464]

If anything it will become communism

[/quote]Ur a fukin idiot, america would never even go close to communism.

america is communist in a way.

  1. we only have 2 political parties that control the government.
  2. presidents can get away with a lot of shit.
  3. they take away our rights and freedoms.

wut[/quote]
wut indeed.
Greg the Xeno: If you’re going to make a statement like that, do some research first.
And something you should have known:

We don’t talk about things we don’t know. This is an informative, not a misinformative community.

[quote=“Frell, post:42, topic:301082”][quote author=chrisn2323 link=topic=397382.msg2963056#msg2963056 date=1253379438]

FEMA…

What about it…?

its full of fail
http://www.wanttoknow.info/femafailureskatrina
[/quote]
It was the government of new Orleans fault, they didn’t want help from a republican (Bush) so they didn’t allow a republican association to help. Then all the ignorant people blamed Bush when it was their governors fault. Not to mention New Orleans didn’t practice their evacuations etc. Bush also knew it was a flood zone, which is why he sent money to them to reinforce the levies. THE GOVERNOR FELT IT WASN’T VERY IMPORTANT SO HE SPENT IT ON OTHER SHT.[/quote]
Do you have any proof of this?

item.title: America becoming a 3rd world country?
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:37, topic:301082”][quote author=chrisn2323 link=topic=397382.msg2963024#msg2963024 date=1253376914]

If anything it will become communism

Yea, a hard ass Capitalist country, that for some reason always thought that they should fight Communism in countries that are none of their business, suddenly becomes Communist itself.

This is what’s going to happen: Obama finishes this administrative period, and then he gets reelected. Only this time, he wins with a smaller advantage. After that period, another Republican wins the elections, and so on. The following 8 years socialist bills will pass, and after these 8 years Republicans will get rid of them again.

Have you not seen how hes rushing everything? He knows he isn’t going to be re-elected so hes trying to hammer the health care bill through along with his stimulus packages. Hes going to do so much in these little 4 years, and we aren’t even a full year in and he’s lost alot of his supporters. After the seniors realize what he’s doing, he will lose loads of support. The only thing holding him up will be the black community.

If anything it will become communism

[/quote]Ur a fukin idiot, america would never even go close to communism.

Exactly, because if you look back in history, every country that has used communism has fallen. - not sarcasm btw

The only reason he is rushing things because he promised so many things and doesn’t want to end up looking like bush and do not many things…

Bush had to deal with 9/11 and Katrina also.

which he did a shit job of…

How so?[/quote]
FEMA…

Read full topic
